title: 自定义怪物
author: 回忆之空
txt_content:
我用了很多办法   Options: 这个 属性都出不来   是插件版本问题么 我服务器 1.8 用的是  MythicMobs-2.3.0

妖艳:
  Type: SKELETON
  Display: '&f[&cLv.4&f]&6妖艳'
  Health: 100
  Damage: 35
  Skills: 
  Drops: 
  - exp 2 
  - 小花花 1 0.5 
  Equipment: 
  - 蒲公英:0 
  - 皮革帽子:4 
  Options:
  - MovementSpeed: 10
  - PreventRenaming: true
  - PreventItemPickup: true
  - PreventBlockInfection: true
  - PreventLeashing: true
  - PreventOtherDrops: true
  - PreventSlimeSplit: true
  - PreventTeleporting: true
  - RepeatAllSkills: true
  - AlwaysShowName: true
火男:
  Type: BLAZE
  Display: '&f[&cLv.3&f]&6火男'
  Health: 70
  Damage: 30
  Skills: 
  Drops: 
  - exp 2 
  - 喉火 1 0.5 
  Equipment: 
  Options: 
    MovementSpeed: 0.3 
    PreventRenaming: true 
    PreventItemPickup: true 
    PreventBlockInfection: true 
    PreventLeashing: true 
    PreventOtherDrops: true 
    PreventSlimeSplit: true 
    PreventTeleporting: true 
    RepeatAllSkills: true 
    AlwaysShowName: true
